title: Should I use mysql 5.6 or 5.7 version on my production db? - Quora

response.answer_text: 5.7 has many good features and improvements comparing to 5.6. So it is more advisable. You can find full list here: Complete list of new features in MySQL 5.7 In my tests 5.6 was about 10% faster than 5.7, but it is very workload and environment dependent. Even knowing that 5.7 is slightly slower, I would use it on new projects.
